features.headline: Boost your marketing career with a personal Google Ads instructor.

items.title: Full courses
items.copy: Master Google Ads from beginner to expert. Step-by-step training on campaign setup, optimization, analytics, and scaling — tailored to your business or career goals.

items.title: Career planning
items.copy: Build your path in digital marketing. Get personal guidance on becoming a Google Ads freelancer, agency owner, or in-house specialist.

items.title: Project managing
items.copy: Manage real ad campaigns with expert feedback. Work on live Google Ads accounts and learn how to plan, execute, and optimize campaigns for measurable results.

items.title: Organized classes
items.copy: Structured lessons for faster progress. Follow a clear learning path with practical assignments, live Q&A sessions, and access to templates and checklists.

items.title: Google Ads Fundamentals: From Beginner to Pro
Google Ads for Businesses: In-House Marketing Training

steps.title: Assess
steps.copy: We evaluate goals and starting point.
